review: I am a techie and like to tinker around with my devices while my family just needs simple interface. Fire tv stick  fits both bills. I was disappointed when hbo go (I have xfinity) didn't work. But with fire tv's android interface, some apps can be sideloaded. I have bluetooth and a hp z6000 mouse connected to use sideloaded apps. Completely satisfied. Good job amazon.

review: Overall the Firestick is great as it allows you to make any TV with USB a smart TV. The apps work well and pretty much seamlessly. The one issue I have is that the remote is a little flimsy. It's really easy to press too hard while maneuvering which causes the selection to jump more than one space, or in my case 5 or 6 spaces.  Just press gently on the remote and it should remedy this issue or so it seems.
